def __init__(self, 
                config_path, 
                device='cuda:0'):
        if 'cuda' in device:
            assert torch.cuda.is_available()

        hps = utils.get_hparams_from_file(config_path)

        model = SynthesizerTrn(
            len(getattr(hps, 'symbols', [])),
            hps.data.filter_length // 2 + 1,
            n_speakers=hps.data.n_speakers,
            **hps.model,
        ).to(device)

        model.eval()
        self.model = model
        self.hps = hps
        self.device = device
